data.title: The Ferraro Group
data.text:
Mr. Sullivan has managed campaigns and provided government affairs services in Nevada since 1990. Most recently, he served as a senior advisor to former Nevada Governor Steve Sisolak and current Clark County Commission Chair Jim Gibson. He currently oversees a number of high-profile clients on local and state government issues in a variety of industries, including transportation, banking, the public sector and telecommunications to name a few.

Additionally, he has been a registered lobbyist in Carson City for more than two decades and has worked on some of the biggest bills to come before the body.

Raised in Southern Nevada, Mr. Sullivan attended the University of Nevada, Reno and graduated with a degree in journalism. During his time on campus, he was editor of the school newspaper Sagebrush. His first job was with the Las Vegas Sun newspaper where he worked as a reporter under the direction of former Nevada Governor Mike Oâ€™Callaghan.

Because of his experience in the journalism and political worlds, Mr. Sullivan knows through years of experience how best to guide his clients and their issues so they have the best chance of being successful.
